title: CBIC Exempts Excise Duty on Unbranded, Non-Retail Unmanufactured Tobacco and Refuse
content:
# CBIC Exempts Excise Duty on Unbranded, Non-Retail Unmanufactured Tobacco and Refuse

Ek important update hai Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ki taraf se. Government ne unmanufactured tobacco aur tobacco refuse par excise duty se exemption announce kiya hai, jin par koi brand name nahi hai aur jo retail sale ke liye pack nahi kiye gaye hain.

*   **What's New:** Ab unmanufactured tobacco aur tobacco refuse par 'Nil' excise duty lagegi, agar un par koi brand name nahi hai aur unhe retail sale ke liye pack nahi kiya gaya hai.
*   **Background:** Yeh naya notification, Notification No. 03/2025–Central Excise, dated December 31, 2025, mein amendment karta hai. Pehle, unmanufactured tobacco aur tobacco refuse par 18% excise duty lagti thi.
*   **Purpose:** Is amendment ka aim raw, bulk, ya agricultural-stage tobacco supplies ko differentiate karna hai jo direct consumer markets ke liye nahi hain, aur unhe concessional treatment dena hai.
*   **Official Notification:** Yeh change Notification No. 04/2026 – Central Excise, dated 1st February, 2026 ke through kiya gaya hai.
